title: marauder ashe
body: no texture changes ? pretty disappointing skin

replies.body: it's only a 750 rp skin, what did you expect? it still looks cool nonetheless.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Nm3vtEjV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-18T05:43:32.869+0000)
>
> it's only a 750 rp skin, what did you expect? it still looks cool nonetheless.

something along the lines of the warden skins, all abilities are just plain ashe, its boring

It's.
A.
750RP.
Skin.

What part do you not understand?

The Warden skins are exactly the same too... what are you on about?

750 RP and below skins are basically just character model recolours.
975 RP skins have some texture/ability changes.
1350 and higher are the awesome ones with custom sounds and stuff.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Nm3vtEjV,comment-id=000000000002,timestamp=2015-02-18T07:20:14.787+0000)
>
> The Warden skins are exactly the same too... what are you on about?
> 
> 750 RP and below skins are basically just character model recolours.
> 975 RP skins have some texture/ability changes.
> 1350 and higher are the awesome ones with custom sounds and stuff.

how are they ? naut has almost a complete texture change with his passive, his shield and even his e is a different coloration, sivir is the same with her q e and ult
